Text: If you're wondering, I also cropped out the black bars, so the video is 854x352 resolution.
Need more seeds!  Make sure to seed after you download; I don't have a fat pipe.

It tends to bug if you want to switch to further scenes, but the movie runs smoothly otherwise.
Thanks for the VLC download as well.
Bad seed though, but got it downloaded in a night at least! :P

Thanks again
